ResearchProjectDef.label: Athenium Reclamation
ResearchProjectDef.description: We've discovered a new material inside psychic artifacts: athenium. With some research, we could learn how to extract it from these artifacts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Athenium can be used for far more than making artifacts. Using it, we could build a "psychic trainer", a device capable of giving a human psychic abilities. This will require research, of course.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psychic Workbench
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creating a unified psychic workbench will greatly simplify the process of working with athenium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Unlocking the Subconscious
ResearchProjectDef.description: Though we can awaken psychic abilites in people, we still don't know how to train the use of them. Investigations into the subconscious may provide us with ideas on how to train simple psionic abilites.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mind and Body
ResearchProjectDef.description: Psionics and cybernetics don't mix, limiting our ability to physically enhance our psions. However, new techniques could be developed that enhance the physical abilities of our psions through psionics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psi Empathy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Psions have the capability of being much more sensitive to the emotions of others, if we train them properly. By developing techniques that utilize this phenomenon, we could enhance the social skills of our psions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psi Meditation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use of psionic abilites requires immense focus and energy. By training our psions in specialized psi meditation techniques, we can improve their mastery of psionic abilites.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psi Combat
ResearchProjectDef.description: Direct attacks using psionic abilities are still beyond our grasp, however, new techniques could be developed that improve our psions effectiveness in combat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psychic Equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Weaving threads of athenium into a fabric can allow us to create psychically active equipment. This new equipment won't protect too well, though.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psychic Weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: By integrating athenium with existing weapon designs, we can create psychically active weapons that integrate directly with the user's mind. Using such weapons effectively will also require training.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Artifact Creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: We've disassembled enough psychic artifacts to know a little about how they work. With some research, we could create such artifacts from athenium and some plasteel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psychic Suppression Field
ResearchProjectDef.description: Psychic foil helmets are just the beginning of our ability to suppress psychic ability. With some research, we could create a building that suppresses psychic sensitivity in individuals close to it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Athenium Creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Athenium supply is a limiting factor in our ability to utilize psionics. Learning how to create it would be incredibly useful.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Projection Theory
ResearchProjectDef.description: So far our psionic abilities have been limited to affecting only the user. With research though, we could discover how to project psychic phenomenon into other people.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Perfected Meditation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Expanding upon existing psi meditation techniques, new and even more powerful techniques can be developed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Battlefield Mastery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Projection theory doesn't just allow the projection of effects to others, but also an expanded ability to receive signals from targets. Using this, advanced psi combat techniques could be developed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mind Connection
ResearchProjectDef.description: Psychic projection can be used for more than harming people. New projection techniques can have a variety of helpful effects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mind Invasion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Psychic projection can be used for devastating abilities that destroy the minds of those they touch, if we developed methods to do so.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Psychic Equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Developing new athenium composites will allow us to make psychically active armor that both protects the user and enhances their psychic abilities, and enhance existing armors to be psychically potent.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psi Transcendence
ResearchProjectDef.description: We haven't reached the peak of psionic abilites yet. Further research will enable us to use the most powerful psionic abilities. Perhaps they don't rival the powers of the archotechs, but we will reign supreme among human psions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mind Fortress
ResearchProjectDef.description: The ultimate psionic defence technique. Mind fortress makes the psion immune to psionic attacks, but not without great cost as use of the mind fortress technique makes the psion unable to use any active abilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psi Rally
ResearchProjectDef.description: The ultimate psionic support ability. By temporarily disconnecting from their body, the psion can connect with other minds and route them to each other, increasing everyone's abilities for a time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psi Storm
ResearchProjectDef.description: The ultimate psionic attack ability. By temporarily disconnecting from their body, the psion can assault other minds, causing varying levels of insanity to every enemy near them.
